event.description: Today we celebrate the conclusion of another year of Children's Ministry classes. While the bulk of the classes will take the summer off, we will still have nursery and PreK available. More information about new classes for the fall will be coming soon.
event.name: Children's Ministry Promotion Day
event.summary: Today we celebrate the conclusion of another year of Children's Ministry classes.  While the bulk of the classes will take the summer off, we will still have nursery and PreK available.  More information about new classes for the fall will be coming soon.
